description:
Smart. Focused. Email.

Fast, cross-platform email designed to filter out the noise - so you can focus on what's important.
We’ve made it easier to collaborate with your teammates — even if they’re not using Spark. Here’s what’s new:
- Shared Accounts with Office 365 and Outlook: Now you can collaborate with your team using the accounts you already rely on.
- Slack integration: Keep your teammates in the loop without leaving Spark. Share important emails as links with our Slack integration.
- Plenty of under-the-hood fixes and improvements. They’re certainly smaller, but no less mighty.
As always, if you have any questions or feedback, reach out at support@sparkmailapp.com.
P.S. If you encounter any issues with the automatic update, please use the following link to download the update manually:
https://downloads.sparkmailapp.com/Spark3/win/dist/3.26.0.117234/Spark.exe
